info.title: ParkIt API
info.description: API for managing parkings and authentication in the ParkIt application

post.description: Logs in a user and returns a token

get.description: Retrieve aggregated statistics for the dashboard, including total parkings, reservations, clients, and income
Retrieve all parkings with optional keyword search

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search in name, price, or limit

post.description: Store a new parking in the database

put.description: Update an existing parking by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the parking to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the parking to delete

post.description: Store a new reservation for a parking spot

from_date.description: Start date and time of the reservation

to_date.description: End date and time of the reservation

400.description: Parking is full or invalid request

put.description: Update an existing reservation by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the reservation to update

400.description: Parking is full or dates overlap

message.example: Parking is full or dates overlap with other reservations

get.description: Retrieve all reservations for the authenticated user

put.description: Cancel an existing reservation by ID if owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the reservation to cancel
